home.title: Arsène Lupin
home.quote: « One must be of one's time. »
home.description: Dive into the universe of the most famous gentleman-burglar in French literature, created by Maurice Leblanc.

character.title: The Character
character.subtitle: The ultimate gentleman-burglar
character.description: Arsène Lupin is a fictional character created by Maurice Leblanc in 1905. A gentleman-burglar with multiple faces, he embodies elegance and intelligence in the service of crime... or justice.

works.title: The Works
works.subtitle: The Lupin canon in order of publication

meta.homeDescription: The universe of gentleman-burglar Arsène Lupin
meta.worksDescription: Discover all the adventures of Arsène Lupin by Maurice Leblanc
